charges.charge_description: 21:841(a) CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: 132 Months incarceration on each of Counts 1, 4 and 5, concurrent; 60 Months on Count 2 and 120 Months on Count 3, to be served concurrently, for a total sentence of 132 Months; 3 Years Supervised Released on each of Counts 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5 of the Indictment, to be served concurrently; $500.00 Special Assessment. No fine.
